item.title: Emacs Blogging Workflow
item.description: Inspired by An Emacs Blogging Workflow, I choose Hugo + Emacs as my blogging platform. Hugo is a static site generator. It natively supports org-mode, builds fast, and has live reloading. deploy-blog will goto your blog content, run hugo, cleanup old html, and push the updates. start-blog-server will run hugo server if not already running, and open the webpage in your browser. My blog workflow is then to startup the server (SPC a a), write some content in org-mode and see it reflected in the browser on each save, and deploy (SPC a b).
